alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 10:16PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, north central Carbon and southwestern Yellowstone Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 1014 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 24 miles south of Ryegate to near Columbus. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, along with brief heavy rain and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Billings, Columbus, Laurel, Billings West End, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Acton, Park City, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Rapelje, Molt, Comanche and Silesia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
